trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ponte Vedra
There were no other sightings in Ponte Vedra on or around August 13th 2013
Summary: Unusual blue light descends straight downward
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from work with my sister in the car heading south on a1a near the address mentioned (near a walgreens). i observed an unusual tight cluster of pulsing blue\white lights in the sky; star-like. it was cloudy outside so the light was slightly obscured. i initially believed the light to be an airplane traveling west but then the light switched direction toward the east. after traveling east for a short duration the object stopped in mid-air "hovering" in place. after a short duration the object began to descend straight-down rapidly until it disappeared behind a building (the walgreens). the descent took approx. 15 seconds. the object appeared to land. both me and my sister observed the event.
